description: Add user criteria after content_after_messages hook.
replace:
$0
<xf:if is="is_addon_active('XFMG')">
	<xf:set var="$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}max_media_count" />	
	<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia}}"
			   label="{{ phrase('th_user_criteria_user_has_added_no_more_than_x_media_items:') }}">
		<xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia}][data][media_items]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameXFMGMaxMedia}.media_items}"
					  size="5" min="0" step="1" />
	</xf:option>
	<xf:set var="$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}max_album_count" />	
	<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum}}"
			   label="{{ phrase('th_user_criteria_user_has_created_no_more_than_x_albums:') }}">
		<xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum}][data][albums]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameXFMGMaxAlbum}.albums}"
					  size="5" min="0" step="1" />
	</xf:option>
</xf:if>
<xf:if is="is_addon_active('XFRM')">
	<xf:set var="$fieldNameMaxResources" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}max_resources" />	
	<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameMaxResources}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameMaxResources}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameMaxResources}}"
			   label="{{ phrase('th_user_criteria_user_has_created_no_more_than_x_resources:') }}">
		<xf:numberbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameMaxResources}][data][resources]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameMaxResources}.resources}"
					  size="5" min="0" step="1" />
	</xf:option>
</xf:if>
